fulltext:
Hoang Minh Quan NGUYEN 
33 Rue de la Marne, 10000 Troyes, France 
(+33) 7 69 12 30 06 
hoang-minh-quan.nguyen@get-mail.eu 
PROFILE STATEMENT 
Being meticulous, efficient time management, with a remarkable competence in mathematics and financial factors, I am 
seeking an opportunity to leverage technical and professional skills to develop in finance industry, as well as contribute 
value and promote the company’s growth. 
EDUCATION 
Groupe ESC Troyes en Champagne, Troyes, France 
           [Aug. 2016 – Nov. 2018] 
Master in Audit & Management Control  
Top 3% graduation 
Foreign Trade University, Ho Chi Minh City Campus, Vietnam  
           [Aug. 2012 – Apr. 2016] 
Bachelor in International Business Economics 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Sodex Sport - French producer of sports equipment, nets and accessories since 1991 
Accounting and Management Control Assistant 
           [Mar. 2018 – Sep. 2018] 
Financial Accounting 
• 
Facilitated cash disbursement and collection procedure, which optimized data process by 65% and increased 
relative collection effectiveness index by 4%. 
• 
Issued local invoices, supervised clients' credit history, performed invoice reconciliation and commercial discount 
for agencies, local and foreign clients. 
• 
Calculated salary, bonus, piece rate for 200 employees in less than 2 days. 
• 
Conducted and analyzed monthly turnover reports filtered by geographic zones & clients for the CEO. 
• 
Supported Chief Accountant during tax inspection which resulted in $4.000 decrease in tax penalty. 
• 
Implemented general account of material, semi-finished and finished product input – output – inventory - COGS. 
Management Control 
• 
Oversaw inventory to optimize warehousing and monitored stock keepers’ performance. 
• 
Promoted ERP system throughout departments: preparing data transfer, setting up input form with accounting 
rules, solving communication and technical issues. 
• 
Recomputed production cost, margin implemented on price form, amortization for machines and moulds, wages 
per hour for workers, fixed direct and indirect cost. 
CODUPHA Compagnie Du Pharmaceutique - Central Pharmaceutical Joint Stock Company 
Accounting and Logistics Trainee 
              [Oct. 2015 – Jan. 2016] 
• 
Compiled general ledger entries with 100% accuracy. 
• 
Interpreted data, analyzed results, and provided financial reports for supervisor. 
• 
Maintained Cash & Bank account reconciliation. 
• 
Facilitated payments by verifying documentation and requesting disbursements. 
• 
Identified issues and resolved invoice discrepancies. 
KEY STRENGTHS 
• 
Accounting software (MISA, Power BI, A&C) 
• 
Proficient teamwork skills 
• 
Analytical thinking and research 
• 
Great attention to detail 
• 
Advanced English (TOEIC 950, IELTS 6.5) 
• 
French (B1) and Chinese (A2) 
• 
Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) 
• 
Ability to work under pressure
VOLUNTEER EXPERIENCE 
• 
Monitored foodstuffs’ volume and classified garments for the French Red Cross fund-raising boutique.  
• 
Budgeted $714 for charity project, which resulted in 150 gifts for kids in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. 
REFERENCE 
Mr. Alann BOUVOT - CEO of Sodex Sport. 
Mrs. Thi Nguyen Thi NGUYEN - Chief Accountant of Sodex Sport. 
Mr. Van Son LE - Director of CODUPHA.
